name: Nextcloud
short_description: Self-hosted file sync and collaboration platform with calendar, contacts, and sharing.
description: Self-hosted file sync and collaboration platform with calendar, contacts, and sharing. Nextcloud is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, utility, storage, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Nextcloud on your home server to self-hosted file sync and collaboration platform with calendar, contacts, and sharing without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Nextcloud to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
